name: Cloud Guru
tag_list: cloud, guru, wireless, mobile, data-center, architect, virtualization, google, salesforce, amazon, crm, apps
overview:
Cloud Guru Inc helps small & medium businesses on their journey to the Cloud.

The Cloud Guru Difference is our suite of services from the best players in the Cloud market, including Google, Amazon, Salesforce and Rackspace; plus, our 20+ years in the industry.

So if you’re looking to offload expensive, short-life infrastructure to save money and become more efficient by making services and processes more available from anywhere, Cloud Guru has the process, the tools and the experience to get it done right.
